item.title: [Python] Report from the site. What I think is necessary to utilize AI/IoT in the manufacturing industry
item.description: I will post Qiita for the first time. â€¥ I’m always indebted to you, but I’m sorry for not posting. Introduction As is said to be the “cliff of 2025,” digital transformation is an urgent issue for the manufacturing industry. While emerging countries are chasing after quality and cost, I feel the harshness of Japan at the factory. I wonder, “Is Japanese quality really good?” (Maybe it’s just my factory!
